name: Binding Throw
text: You can strike your enemy and use the blow as an opportunity to grab and hold him.
prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Ki Throw.
benefit: After you successfully use the Ki Throw feat on an opponent, you can use a swift action to attempt a grapple combat maneuver against that opponent.
normal: The grapple combat maneuver is a standard action.
special: A monk can gain Binding Throw as a bonus feat starting at 14th level.
staminaText: You can spend 1 stamina point to gain a +2 bonus on a grapple check made as a swift action with this feat.
text_zh: 你攻击你的敌人，并顺势捕获和擒住他。
prerequisites_zh: 精通擒抱，精通绊摔，太极推手。
benefit_zh: 当你成功的对一个敌人使用了“太极推手”，你可以用一次迅捷动作对其进行一次战技检定以尝试擒抱他。
normal_zh: 进行擒抱战技检定是一个标准动作。
special_zh: 武僧可以在14级以后选择该专长作为奖励专长。
staminaText_zh: 你可以花费1点耐力，在迅捷擒抱时获得2点加值。
